attributes.action: 50% off shopping bills for Health workers and emergency service employees.
attributes.additional_details: Because of their hard working efforts for the country
attributes.background: To reward Health workers and emergency service employees and care workers with 50% off their shopping for their continued commitment to their job for the benefit of the public.

rejection.details:
Individual retailers are responsible for deciding what, if any, discounts to offer certain customers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
